# Number of Bytes

> Size (in bytes) of a 16-bit unsigned integer.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var UINT16_NUM_BYTES = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/uint16-num-bytes' );
```

#### UINT16_NUM_BYTES

Size (in bytes) of a 16-bit unsigned integer.

``` javascript
UINT16_NUM_BYTES === 2;
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var UINT16_NUM_BYTES = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/uint16-num-bytes' );

console.log( UINT16_NUM_BYTES );
// => 2
```
